import React from 'react' import './ListItem.scss' import { useState } from 'react' import yash from '../../assets/yash.png' import { Add, PlayArrow, ThumbDownAltOutlined, ThumbUpAltOutlined, } from '@material-ui/icons' const trailler = 'https://youtu.be/qXgF-iJ_ezE' const ListItem = ({ index }) => { const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false) return (
setIsHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsHovered(false)} > {isHovered && ( <>
) } export default ListItem
